instructions: Tap your profile picture at the top right. If you don t see a profile picture, tap Summary or Browse at the bottom of the screen, then scroll to the top of the screen. Tap Medical ID, then tap Get Started.

Tap your profile picture at the top right. If you don t see a profile picture, tap Summary or Browse at the bottom of the screen, then scroll to the top of the screen. Tap Medical ID. To make changes, tap Edit.
